head.title: New Hulk of the Road: 7,000 Pounds of Ego

hedline.hl1: New Hulk of the Road: 7,000 Pounds of Ego

abstract.p: Ulrik Poulsen letter, commenting on August 6 article, says Hummer sports utility vehicle planned by General Motors should be banned, calling it deadly adversary on or off road; drawing (S)

block.p: Re ''G.M. Has High Hopes for Vehicle Truly Meant for Road Warriors'' (front page, Aug. 6):

The Hummer is exactly the type of vehicle that ought to be banned from Manhattan and any other city in its right mind. Impossible to park and an environmental cesspool, it may be a natural for people like Mike Tyson and spoiled children of Wall Street tycoons. To almost everybody else it is an ugly, brutish, sometimes deadly adversary on or off the road.
